abstract: Bank of America is negotiating with the staff of the New York attorney general to settle claims that the bank failed to adequately disclose the risks of the takeover to its shareholders.
snippet: Bank of America is negotiating with the staff of the New York attorney general to settle claims that the bank failed to adequately disclose the risks of the takeover to its shareholders.
lead_paragraph: A year after its controversial takeover of Merrill Lynch, Bank of America is discussing settling a troublesome state inquiry into the star-crossed deal and the billions of dollars in bonuses that Merrill hurriedly paid its employees.

headline.main: Bank Is in Talks to Settle State Claims Over Merrill
headline.print_headline: Bank Is in Talks to Settle State Claims Over Merrill

abstract: Gregory Curl, who lost out to Brian T. Moynihan for the top job at Bank of America, is now expected to lose the chief risk officer post he has held since mid-2009, The Wall Street Journal reported.
snippet: Gregory Curl, who lost out to Brian T. Moynihan for the top job at Bank of America, is now expected to lose the chief risk officer post he has held since mid-2009, The Wall Street Journal reported.
lead_paragraph: Gregory Curl, who lost out to Brian T. Moynihan for the top job at Bank of America, may now find himself demoted.

headline.main: BofA’s Curl to Lose Risk Post, Report Says

abstract: Bank of America shuffled its top management on Wednesday afternoon, replacing its chief risk officer and starting a search for a new chief financial officer, as Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive, moved to put his team in place at the bank.
snippet: Bank of America shuffled its top management on Wednesday afternoon, replacing its chief risk officer and starting a search for a new chief financial officer, as Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive, moved to put his team in place at the bank...
lead_paragraph: Bank of America shuffled its top management on Wednesday afternoon, replacing its chief risk officer and starting a search for a new chief financial officer, as Brian T. Moynihan, the new chief executive, moved to put his team in place.

headline.main: Bank of America Shuffles Its Top Management
